original_text: And they did so; for Aaron stretched out his hand with his rod, and smote the dust of the earth, and it became lice in man, and in beast; all the dust of the land became lice throughout all the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 그들이 그대로 행할새 아론이 지팡이를 잡고 손을 들어 땅의 티끌을 치매 애굽 온 땅의 티끌이 다 이가 되어 사람과 가축에게 오르니

sentences.original_text: for Aaron stretched out his hand with his rod
sentences.korean_translation: 아론이 그의 지팡이로 손을 뻗었기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: and smote the dust of the earth
and it became lice in man
all the dust of the land became lice
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅의 모든 먼지가 이가 되었으니

sentences.original_text: throughout all the land of Egypt
